sentences.en: Attitude, chemistry and professionalism were recurring themes throughout Bird's lengthy question - and - answer session.
sentences.cn: 态度, 化合作用和职业性是bird整个新闻发布会得主题.

sentences.en: Good customer relations require courtesy, professionalism and effective response.
sentences.cn: 良好的客户关系需要做到礼貌、专业，并提供有效的回复。

sentences.en: He is famous for his tough-minded professionalism.
sentences.cn: 他说一不二的职业作风是出了名的。

sentences.en: His success has been a tribute to hard work, to professionalism.
sentences.cn: 他的成功充分体现了他的勤劳苦干和敬业精神。

sentences.en: I respected his professionalism, his honesty, and his ability.
sentences.cn: 我钦佩他精通业务, 为人诚实能干.

sentences.en: I was amazed by their discourtesy and lack of professionalism.
sentences.cn: 他们的无礼和不专业让我震惊。

sentences.en: I've impressed upon them the need for more professionalism.
sentences.cn: 我已使他们深刻认识到提高专业素养的必要性。

sentences.en: In the end her sheer competence and professionalism won universal respect.
sentences.cn: 她的卓越的能力和专门技能终于赢得了普遍的尊重.
它旨在提高教师的专业精神.

sentences.en: No one can touch these girls for professionalism.
sentences.cn: 就职业素养来说，没人能比得上这些姑娘。

sentences.en: the dedication and professionalism of our staff
sentences.cn: 我们员工的奉献精神和专业素质

sentences.en: There was a lack of professionalism in their dealings.
sentences.cn: 他们的经营方式缺乏专业水准。

sentences.en: These inhumanities, she cloaked with her professionalism.
sentences.cn: 她用职业的幌子隐藏自己的残酷无情.

sentences.en: They were impressed by the sheer professionalism of the performance.
sentences.cn: 他们赞佩表演炉火纯青.

sentences.en: We all admire professionalism and dedication.
sentences.cn: 我们大家都对专业素质和奉献精神表示钦佩。

sentences.en: We were impressed by the professionalism of the staff.
sentences.cn: 职员的专业素质给我们的印象很深。
